description:
Naruto is helpless against Gara’s immense power. While Naruto declares that he fights for his comrades, Gaara says he fights for himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikari to Yami, Gaara to Iu Na
Licht und Dunkelheit – Der Name Gaara
Light vs. Dark: The Two Faces of Gaara
แสงสว่างและความมืด
光と闇 我愛羅という名
